title: Argument
summary: [Character 1] has a fierce argument with [Character 2].

title: Sick visit
summary: [Character 1] visits [Character 2] at the treatment ward.

title: Butcher's circus
summary: [Character 1] fights [Character 2] in the butcher's circus.

title: Bar Encounter
summary: [Character 1] and [Character 2] unexpectedly meet at the local tavern.

title: Competitive Event
summary: [Character 1] and [Character 2] compete in a personal competition.

title: Joint Mission Briefing
summary: [Character 1] and [Character 2] take part in an important mission briefing.

title: Late night visit
summary: [Character 1] shows up at [character 2]'s room late at night.

title: Nomads Wagon
summary: [Character 1] and [character 2] haggle with the trinket merchant.

title: Praise
summary: [Character 1] praises the best aspects of [character 2].

title: Secret Revealed
summary: [Character 1] accidentally reveals a personal secret to [Character 2].

title: Greed
summary: [Character 1] tries to get money from [Character 2].

title: Sexual Activities
summary: Domineering, awkward, or passionate, [Character 1] and [character 2] engage in sexual activities.

title: Unexpected Visitor
summary: In their everyday work, duties, or errands, [Character 1] receives an unexpected visit from [Character 2].

title: Impromptu Performance
summary: [Character 1] is coerced (or attempted) into giving an impromptu performance of some talent with [Character 2] as the primary audience.

title: Lost in the Woods
summary: [Character 1] and [Character 2] lose their way in the forest around the Hamlet and struggle to find their way home.

title: Graveyard Vigil
summary: [Character 1] and [Character 2] keep a solemn vigil in the graveyard, honoring fallen comrades.

title: Shared Nightmare
summary: [Character 1] and [Character 2] wake from the same horrifying nightmare, seeking each other out afterwards.

title: Tavern Brawl
summary: A heated argument between [Character 1] and [Character 2] escalates into a full-blown tavern brawl.

title: Shore Patrol
summary: [Character 1] and [Character 2] patrol the misty shores, alert for signs of Fishfolk emerging from the sea.

title: Nomad's Riddle
summary: [Character 1] and [Character 2] work together to solve a cryptic riddle posed by the Nomad.
